tool_description:
if you send list of keywords, this api will return technical synonyms for each keyword.  
This can be used for make serach keyword formula for searching prior arts in engineering or sience, patent fields.
name: Technical Synonym Generator
title: Technical Synonym Generator

api_list.name: get technical synonyms
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://technical-synonym-generator.p.rapidapi.com/api/chat"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "technical-synonym-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://technical-synonym-generator.p.rapidapi.com/api/chat"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "technical-synonym-generator.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
